mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_category (category_code, user_id, priority_ord) VALUES (#{categoryCode}, #{userId}, #{priorityOrd})
mapper.select: SELECT uc.category_code AS categoryCode, c.code_nm AS categoryName, uc.priority_ord AS priorityOrd FROM user_category uc LEFT JOIN code c ON c.code_ty = 'CATEGORY' AND c.code = uc.category_code WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uc.priority_ord ASC
